ChronicleEntry¶

class Sakurajima.models.chronicle.ChronicleEntry(data_dict, network, api_url)¶

A chronicle tracks a user’s watch history. A chronicle maybe specific to a single series or it maybe a more general user chronicle. A ChronicleEntry object represents a single in entry in a chronicle.

anime_id¶

The ID of the anime that the chronicle entry relates to.

anime_title¶

The title of the anime that the chronicle entry relates to.

chronicle_id¶

The ID of the chronicle entry.

date¶

The date the chronicle entry was created.

ep_title¶

The title of the episode that the chronicle entry relates to.

episode¶

The episode number of the watched episode.

remove_chronicle_entry()¶

Removes the entry from the user’s chronicle.

Returns

True if the operation is successful, False if an error occured.

Return type

bool
